description: When configuring Group Policy Objects (GPOs) for Windows 11 on different Organizational Units (OUs), setting 'Specify source service for the following classes of windows update' in combination with WSUS can lead to issues. Specifically, attempting to install the SNMP feature via PowerShell results in the error code 0x800f0950. This error can be resolved by setting the GPO to 'Not Configured', allowing the installation process to proceed without interruptions.
